verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

שְׁלַח־ <WH7971> she-lach- Send לְךָ֣ le-Cha אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> 'a-na-Shim, thou men וְיָתֻ֙רוּ֙ <WH8446> ve-ya-Tu-ru that they may search אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am נֹתֵ֖ן <WH5414> no-Ten which I give לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> liv-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish of every אֶחָד֩ <WH259> 'e-Chad a man אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> 'ish A man אֶחָ֜ד <WH259> 'e-Chad a לְמַטֵּ֤ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh tribe אֲבֹתָיו֙ <WH1> 'a-vo-Tav of their fathers תִּשְׁלָ֔חוּ <WH7971> tish-La-chu, shall ye send כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol every נָשִׂ֥יא <WH5387> na-Si every one a ruler בָהֶֽם׃ va-Hem.

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach sent אֹתָ֥ם <WH853> 'o-Tam מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses מִמִּדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> mi-mid-Bar them from the wilderness פָּארָ֖ן <WH6290> pa-Ran of Paran עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- at פִּ֣י <WH6310> pi by the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD כֻּלָּ֣ם <WH3605> kul-Lam all אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> 'a-na-Shim, men רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> ra-Shei heads בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> Hem-mah. [were]

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמוֹתָ֑ם <WH8034> she-mo-Tam; And these [were] their names לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֔ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven, of Reuben שַׁמּ֖וּעַ <WH8051> sham-Mu-a' Shammua בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son זַכּֽוּר׃ <WH2139> zak-Kur. of Zaccur
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe שִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on, of Simeon שָׁפָ֖ט <WH8202> sha-Fat Shaphat בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son חוֹרִֽי׃ <WH2753> cho-Ri. of Hori
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah כָּלֵ֖ב <WH3612> ka-Lev Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְפֻנֶּֽה׃ <WH3312> ye-fun-Neh. of Jephunneh
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe יִשָּׂשכָ֔ר <WH3485> yis-so-sh-Char, of Issachar יִגְאָ֖ל <WH3008> yig-'Al Igal בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> yo-Sef. of Joseph
לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe אֶפְרָ֖יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim הוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <WH1954> ho-She-a' Oshea בִּן־ <WH1121> bin- the son נֽוּן׃ <WH5126> Nun. of Nun
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe בִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> vin-ya-Min, of Benjamin פַּלְטִ֖י <WH6406> pal-Ti Palti בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son רָפֽוּא׃ <WH7505> ra-Fu. of Raphu
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe זְבוּלֻ֔ן <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun, of Zebulun גַּדִּיאֵ֖ל <WH1427> gad-di-'El Gaddiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son סוֹדִֽי׃ <WH5476> so-Di. of Sodi

לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> yo-Sef of Joseph לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh [namely] of the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh; of Manasseh גַּדִּ֖י <WH1426> gad-Di Gaddi בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son סוּסִֽי׃ <WH5485> su-Si. of Susi
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe דָ֔ן <WH1835> Dan, of Dan עַמִּיאֵ֖ל <WH5988> 'am-mi-'El Ammiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son גְּמַלִּֽי׃ <WH1582> ge-mal-Li. of Gemalli
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe אָשֵׁ֔ר <WH836> 'a-Sher, of Asher סְת֖וּר <WH5639> se-Tur Sethur בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מִיכָאֵֽל׃ <WH4317> mi-cha-'El. of Michael
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe נַפְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> naf-ta-Li, of Naphtali נַחְבִּ֖י <WH5147> nach-Bi Nahbi בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son וָפְסִֽי׃ <WH2058> va-fe-Si. of Vophsi
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh Of the tribe גָ֔ד <WH1410> Gad, of Gad גְּאוּאֵ֖ל <WH1345> ge-'u-'El Geuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מָכִֽי׃ <WH4352> ma-Chi. of Machi

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot These [are] the names הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim, of the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sha-Lach sent מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh which Moses לָת֣וּר <WH8446> la-Tur to spy out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; the land וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra called מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses לְהוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <WH1954> le-ho-She-a' Oshea בִּן־ <WH1121> bin- the son נ֖וּן <WH5126> nun of Nun יְהוֹשֻֽׁעַ׃ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a'. Jehoshua

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach sent אֹתָם֙ <WH853> 'o-Tam מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses לָת֖וּר <WH8446> la-Tur them to spy out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem, to עֲל֥וּ <WH5927> 'a-Lu unto them Get you up זֶה֙ <WH2088> zeh there בַּנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> ban-Ne-gev, this [way] southward וַעֲלִיתֶ֖ם <WH5927> va-'a-li-Tem and go up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> ha-Har. into the mountain

וּרְאִיתֶ֥ם <WH7200> u-re-'i-Tem And see אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the land מַה־ <WH4100> mah- what הִ֑וא <WH1931> hi he וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am what it [is] and the people הַיֹּשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> hai-yo-Shev that dwelleth עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha, and הֶחָזָ֥ק <WH2389> he-cha-Zak therein whether they [be] strong הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu he הֲרָפֶ֔ה <WH7504> ha-ra-Peh, or weak הַמְעַ֥ט <WH4592> ham-'At few ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he אִם־ <WH518> 'im- or רָֽב׃ <WH7227> Rav. or many

וּמָ֣ה <WH4100> u-Mah How הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, And what the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu they יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> yo-Shev [is] that they dwell in בָּ֔הּ Bah, הֲטוֹבָ֥ה <WH2896> ha-to-Vah whether it [be] good הִ֖וא <WH1931> hi he אִם־ <WH518> 'im- or רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah; or bad וּמָ֣ה <WH4100> u-Mah How הֶֽעָרִ֗ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim, and what cities אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu they יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> yo-Shev [they be] that they dwell בָּהֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> ba-Hen-nah, in הַבְּמַֽחֲנִ֖ים <WH4264> hab-be-ma-cha-Nim whether in tents אִ֥ם <WH518> 'im or בְּמִבְצָרִֽים׃ <WH4013> be-miv-tza-Rim. or in strong holds

וּמָ֣ה <WH4100> u-Mah How הָ֠אָרֶץ <WH776> Ha-'a-retz And what the land הַשְּׁמֵנָ֨ה <WH8082> hash-she-me-Nah [is] whether it [be] fat הִ֜וא <WH1931> hi he אִם־ <WH518> 'im- or רָזָ֗ה <WH7330> ra-Zah, or lean הֲיֵֽשׁ־ <WH3426> ha-yesh- whether there be בָּ֥הּ bah עֵץ֙ <WH6086> 'etz wood אִם־ <WH518> 'im- or אַ֔יִן <WH369> 'A-yin, not וְהִ֨תְחַזַּקְתֶּ֔ם <WH2388> ve-Hit-chaz-zak-Tem, therein or not And be ye of good courage וּלְקַחְתֶּ֖ם <WH3947> u-le-kach-Tem and bring מִפְּרִ֣י <WH6529> mip-pe-Ri of the fruit הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; of the land וְהַ֨יָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> ve-Hai-ya-Mim, Now the time יְמֵ֖י <WH3117> ye-Mei [was] the time בִּכּוּרֵ֥י <WH1061> bik-ku-Rei of the firstripe עֲנָבִֽים׃ <WH6025> 'a-na-Vim. grapes

וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu So they went up וַיָּתֻ֣רוּ <WH8446> vai-ya-Tu-ru and searched אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; the land מִמִּדְבַּר־ <WH4057> mi-mid-bar- from the wilderness צִ֥ן <WH6790> tzin of Zin עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far רְחֹ֖ב <WH7340> re-Cho unto Rehob לְבֹ֥א <WH935> le-Vo as men come חֲמָֽת׃ <WH2574> cha-Mat. to Hamath

וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu And they ascended בַנֶּגֶב֮ <WH5045> van-ne-Gev by the south וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo and came עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against חֶבְרוֹן֒ <WH2275> chev-rOn unto Hebron וְשָׁ֤ם <WH8033> ve-Sham where אֲחִימַן֙ <WH289> 'a-chi-Man where Ahiman שֵׁשַׁ֣י <WH8344> she-Shai Sheshai וְתַלְמַ֔י <WH8526> ve-tal-Mai, and Talmai יְלִידֵ֖י <WH3211> ye-li-Dei the children הָעֲנָ֑ק <WH6061> ha-'a-Nak; of Anak וְחֶבְר֗וֹן <WH2275> ve-chev-Ron, [were] (Now Hebron שֶׁ֤בַע <WH7651> She-va' seven שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> sha-Nim years נִבְנְתָ֔ה <WH1129> niv-ne-Tah, was built לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before צֹ֥עַן <WH6814> Tzo-'an Zoan מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. Egypt

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u And they came עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against נַ֣חַל <WH5158> Na-chal unto the brook אֶשְׁכֹּ֗ל <WH812> 'esh-Kol, of Eshcol וַיִּכְרְת֨וּ <WH3772> vai-yich-re-Tu and cut down מִשָּׁ֤ם <WH8033> mish-Sham there זְמוֹרָה֙ <WH2156> ze-mo-Rah from thence a branch וְאֶשְׁכּ֤וֹל <WH811> ve-'esh-Kol cluster עֲנָבִים֙ <WH6025> 'a-na-Vim of grapes אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, with one וַיִּשָּׂאֻ֥הוּ <WH5375> vai-yis-sa-'U-hu and they bare בַמּ֖וֹט <WH4132> vam-Mot upon a staff בִּשְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> bish-Na-yim; it between two וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- some הָרִמֹּנִ֖ים <WH7416> ha-rim-mo-Nim and [they brought] of the pomegranates וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- some הַתְּאֵנִֽים׃ <WH8384> hat-te-'e-Nim. and of the figs

לַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> lam-ma-Kom The place הַה֔וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu, he קָרָ֖א <WH7121> ka-Ra was called נַ֣חַל <WH5158> Na-chal the brook אֶשְׁכּ֑וֹל <WH812> esh-Kol; Eshcol עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al because אֹד֣וֹת <WH182> o-Dot because of הָֽאֶשְׁכּ֔וֹל <WH811> ha-'esh-Kol, the cluster of grapes אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which כָּרְת֥וּ <WH3772> ka-re-Tu cut down מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> mish-Sham there בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei which the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shu-vu And they returned מִתּ֣וּר <WH8446> mit-Tur from searching הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; of the land מִקֵּ֖ץ <WH7093> mik-Ketz after אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> 'ar-ba-'Im forty יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> Yom. days

וַיֵּלְכ֡וּ <WH1980> vai-ye-le-Chu proceeded וַיָּבֹאוּ֩ <WH935> vai-ya-vo-'U and came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֨ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh to Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron and to Aaron וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֲדַ֧ת <WH5712> 'a-Dat and to all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- in מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> mid-Bar unto the wilderness פָּארָ֖ן <WH6290> pa-Ran of Paran קָדֵ֑שָׁה <WH6946> ka-De-shah; to Kadesh וַיָּשִׁ֨יבוּ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shi-vu and brought back אוֹתָ֤ם <WH853> o-Tam דָּבָר֙ <WH1697> da-Var word וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah, unto them and unto all the congregation וַיַּרְא֖וּם <WH7200> vai-yar-'Um and shewed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פְּרִ֥י <WH6529> pe-Ri them the fruit הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the land

וַיְסַפְּרוּ־ <WH5608> vay-sap-pe-ru- And they told לוֹ֙ lo וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, him and said בָּ֕אנוּ <WH935> Ba-nu We came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz unto the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher where שְׁלַחְתָּ֑נוּ <WH7971> she-lach-Ta-nu; whither thou sentest וְ֠גַם <WH1571> Ve-gam certainly זָבַ֨ת <WH2100> za-Vat us and surely it floweth חָלָ֥ב <WH2461> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבַ֛שׁ <WH1706> u-de-Vash and honey הִ֖וא <WH1931> hi he וְזֶה־ <WH2088> ve-zeh- and this פִּרְיָֽהּ׃ <WH6529> pir-Yah. and this [is] the fruit
